original_title: Washakie y el chico de las manos mojadas
overview: The Washakie's village is suffering an unprecedented drought. His father is ill and scarcity of water has made it worse. The boy embarks on a journey to the east, the forbidden land, to seek help from the American colonists. There he meets a mysterious cowboy who flees the civilization, whom Washakie will find suspicious.
title: Washakie and the Boy with Wet Hands
